This week's Cherry Picks focuses on volatility and skew in trading. Bitcoin has shown less volatility in its recent upside move. Implied volatility was analyzed across major markets like the Russell, Dow, e-mini S&P 500, and NASDAQ, along with skew in individual names like Tesla, TLT, and Nvidia. This highlights different skew dynamics in the option market.
Two trade ideas in SMH and GLDD based on trends in the option market.
